docs.snippet: MEXICO CITY, Jan. 24--"The peasants have been warned not to talk to us," the Rev. Rutilio Grande said as he showed a visitor around an impoverished hamlet in El Salvador. "The landlord's gunmen have told them they'll be shot if they're caught with...
docs.lead_paragraph: MEXICO CITY, Jan. 24--"The peasants have been warned not to talk to us," the Rev. Rutilio Grande said as he showed a visitor around an impoverished hamlet in El Salvador. "The landlord's gunmen have told them they'll be shot if they're caught with us." But a few weeks later, it was the activist Jesuit himself who was murdered outside his church.

docs.snippet: MEXICO CITY, Jan. 21--The InterAmerican Human Rights Commission has accused El Salvador's right-wing military Government of murdering political opponents and of torturing others in clandestine prison cells....
docs.lead_paragraph: MEXICO CITY, Jan. 21--The InterAmerican Human Rights Commission has accused El Salvador's right-wing military Government of murdering political opponents and of torturing others in clandestine prison cells.
docs.abstract: Inter-Amer Human Rights Comm accuses El Salvador's right-wing mil Govt of murdering pol opponents and of torturing others in clandestine prison cells; comm, in special rept to be presented to Gen Assembly of OAS, also accuses regime of 'systematically persecuting' RC Ch; recommends dismantling of 80,000-strong rural paramilitary force known as Orden, which it accuses of terrorizing nation's peasants; security forces kill 5 persons, including priest, who were holding meeting in parish hall; Govt says they were participating in guerrilla training; Rev Octavio Ortiz Luna is 4th RC priest to be killed in El Salvador in last 2 yrs; map (M)
